Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the big defensin family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli 09:K39 (IC50=5 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium LT2 (IC50=20 µg/ml), S. minnesota R595 (IC50=1.3 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae (IC50>10 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (IC50<2.5 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans (IC50>20 µg/ml)(Ref.1).Note:Washed with a phosphate buffered saline (PBS, pH 7.0).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Significantly inhibits the growth of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria and fungi in vitro.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in all tissues examined, including hemocytes, heart, hepatopancreas, stomach, intestine and skeletal muscle.
